#include<stdio.h>
long long gcd(long long a, long long b)
{
	long long r = a % b;
	while(r)
	{
		a = b;
		b = r;
		r = a % b;
	}
	return b;
}
int main()
{
	long long a, b, cas, g;
	scanf("%lld",&cas);
	while(cas--)
	{
		scanf("%lld %lld", &a, &b);
		g = gcd(a,b);
		while(g>1)
		{
			b = b/g;
			g = gcd(a, b);
		}
		if(b == 1)
		    printf("Yes\n");
		else
		    printf("No\n");
	}
	return 0;	
}
